title: DaMixhub Mixtape & Music Downloader
description:
DaMixhub is the ultimate platform for streaming and downloading hiphop mixtapes and music. We will enable artists and fans connect like never before. Join the movement. Experience the allure.
KEY FEATURES
• Large collection of mixtapes and singles. Discover the latest and get throwbacks of the classics that you don't want to forget.
• Introducing DaMixhub Radio. Let us do the work. Sit back and stream our curated playlists and shows from some of the best DJs 24/7
• Sleek music player allows users uninterrupted streaming on the go. Download tons of music at break-neck speeds
• Save your favorite mixtapes and create unlimited playlists. Never lose your playlists and sync between all your devices.
• Stay up to date with the latest in news & entertainment
• Hottest projects from the hottest artists:Gucci Mane, Drake, Future, Kevin Gates, Chance The Rapper & many more...
• DJ mixes, Hip-hop, Reggae, Dancehall, Electronic, R&B and more...
TAKE YOUR MUSIC SERIOUSLY
Become a member and take your streaming experience to the next level
Basic Membership:
• Enjoy uninterrupted streaming and downloading with No Ads.. No BS!
Premium Membership:
• All the perks with basic membership
• Need big sounds for your speakers? Stream & Download in high quality (up to 320 kbps)
• Cloud storage for favs & playlist. Sync between all your devices.
• Lot more features in the pipeline.. stay tuned.
STAY CONNECTED
@damixhub on all Social Media
By installing this app you agree to the following privacy policy:
'http://www.oneaudience.com/privacy/?package_name=com.JankStudio.Mixtapes'
